items.name: Some Fifty Pale Ale
items.desc:
6 cans of Some Fifty Pale Ale.
Some Fifty is back with a new look and more hop-packed flavour than ever before! Mosaic, Citra, Ekuanot and final flourish of Simcoe collide in this thirst-quenching 5.2% pale ale. Expect each juicy sip to close out with a swift and bitter finish to revive your taste buds in preparation for the next sessionable swig.
Possible delivery delays of up to 7 working days - 24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Please ensure your delivery details are correct at checkout.
Orders placed after 2PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.
